title: Looking for a lovely 3 Bed / 2 bath? Search no more! 1163 Sq Feet
posting_body: ['Brooks Crossing Apartments', 'Leasing Office:', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Brooks Crossing Apartments has to offer!', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by Brooks Crossing Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Rental Information:', '3 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom / 1163 sq ft / $1867/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Deck', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Fireplace', '◾ Freezer', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Range', '◾ Refrigerator', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Wi-Fi', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Additional Information:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Picnic Areas', '◾ Playground', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Sparkling Pool', '◾ Covered Parking', '◾ Fax/Copy Services', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Monthly Resident Events', '◾ Multi Use Room', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Resident Referral Bonuses', '◾ Sports Courts', '◾ Tennis Court', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '4AA79D8D15824A']
